    • Method Detail

      • reportUser

        public boolean reportUser(java.lang.String fromUserId,
                          java.lang.String toUserId,
                          java.lang.String message)
                   throws UserNotFoundException,
                          AuthorizationException
        Reporting a user
        Parameters:
        fromUserId - the user that sent the report
        toUserId - user being reported
        message - what the report is about
        Returns:
        whether or not the report successfully went through
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException - user wasn't found
        AuthorizationException - report is invalid

      • getReports

        all reports
